article.title: Title-Only Entries Retrieved by Use of Truncated Search Keys
article.author: Kilgour, Frederick G.Long, Philip L.Liederman, Eugene B.Landgraf, Alan L.
article.text: An experiment testing utility of truncated search keys as inquiry terms in an on-line system was performed on a file of 16,792 title-only bibliographic entries.. Use of a 3,3 key yields eight or fewer entries 99.0% of the time..
